Phase functions of inactive comet nuclei

Summary: calculation of original and modified IAU phase function parameters (i.e., H,G; H,G1,G2; H,G12) (and maybe also Hapke model parameters?) for inactive comet nuclei

Procedure: identify all known comets for which a minimum number of observations exist where extendedness parameters indicate [mostly] stellar appearances and/or a minimum heliocentric distance criterion is satisfied; retrieve calibrated photometry for a given filter; compute equivalent reduced magnitudes for each apparent magnitude measurement (i.e., for R=Î”=1 AU); compute best-fit phase function parameters for phase function formats of interest

Observation metadata requirements:

  • filter

L1 and L2 product requirements:

  • photometry

Observation geometry requirements:

  • R
  • Delta
  • phase angle
  • true anomaly

L3 outputs:

  • extendedness parameters
